name: Magiflap
description:
A Flappy-Bird replication with a Magikarp twist under the sea!  This is our first complete game after learning the basics of coding & Unity from online tutorials.  We loved the game development process, hope you will enjoy the game as much as we did!

Simple Controls:  Left Mouse Button

Game Dev: Tsucchi
Art: Pikayau

Links to Audio used:
Background Music - https://freesound.org/people/Kodack/sounds/395037/
Next Score - https://freesound.org/people/OwlStorm/sounds/404794/
